sn56.15:1.1: “Dharetha no tumhe, bhikkhave, maya cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti?
sn56.15:1.2: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn56.15:1.3: “aham kho, bhante, dharemi bhagavata cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti.
sn56.15:1.4: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, dharesi maya cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti?
sn56.15:1.5: “Dukkham khvaham, bhante, bhagavata pathamam ariyasaccam desitam dharemi;
sn56.15:1.6: dukkhasamudayam khvaham, bhante, bhagavata dutiyam ariyasaccam desitam dharemi;
sn56.15:1.7: dukkhanirodham khvaham, bhante, bhagavata tatiyam ariyasaccam desitam dharemi;
sn56.15:1.8: dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam khvaham, bhante, bhagavata catuttham ariyasaccam desitam dharemi.
sn56.15:1.9: Evam khvaham, bhante, dharemi bhagavata cattari ariyasaccani desitani”ti.
sn56.15:2.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, dharesi maya cattari ariyasaccani desitaniti.
sn56.15:2.3: Dukkham kho, bhikkhu, maya pathamam ariyasaccam desitam, tatha nam dharehi;
sn56.15:2.4: dukkhasamudayam kho, bhikkhu, maya dutiyam ariyasaccam desitam, tatha nam dharehi;
sn56.15:2.5: dukkhanirodham kho, bhikkhu, maya tatiyam ariyasaccam desitam, tatha nam dharehi;
sn56.15:2.6: dukkhanirodhagamini patipada kho, bhikkhu, maya catuttham ariyasaccam desitam, tatha nam dharehi.
sn56.15:2.7: Evam kho, bhikkhu, dharehi maya cattari ariyasaccani desitaniti.
sn56.15:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhu, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
